participant_1.background:

i am trying to play in a local band.
i am still single at the age of 35.
i m on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.

participant_2.background:
I miss my dog every day.
I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
i wear glasses all day.
I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm good, and you?
Good, thanks. I'm on my way to UC Santa Cruz, where I was accepted. I'm a little nervous, but excited to start fresh.
That's awesome! I hope you enjoy it there.
Thanks, I'm sure I will. What about you? What do you do for a living?
I work at a food pantry, and I'm also trying to start my own juicing bar.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to try juicing.
It's really good for you! I'm trying to advertise it to people in my neighborhood, but I'm not sure how to reach them.
Maybe you could put up flyers or post on social media?
That's a good idea! I'll try that.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go swimming, I miss my dog every day.
That's a shame. I love swimming too. I like to go to the lake with my family.
That sounds nice. I wish I could do that.
Maybe you could come with us sometime!
I'd love that!
Great! We'll have to plan something.
Sounds good
